about_the_game:
A set of 5 "DYNASTY WARRIORS" costumes for those who purchase by March 14, 2025.
Cao Cao, Zhou Yu, Lu Xun, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei, all wearing their extra costumes, will be available as playable characters once the player has completed the tutorial.

Note: Please be aware that this content may become available for purchase or for free at a later date.
detailed_description:
A set of 5 "DYNASTY WARRIORS" costumes for those who purchase by March 14, 2025.
Cao Cao, Zhou Yu, Lu Xun, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei, all wearing their extra costumes, will be available as playable characters once the player has completed the tutorial.

Note: Please be aware that this content may become available for purchase or for free at a later date.

name: WARRIORS: Abyss - "DYNASTY WARRIORS" Costume Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A set of 5 costumes worn by the heroes in "DYNASTY WARRIORS."
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
